00048 
00049 
00050 //! This function write the CPU prescaler register to a define value
00051 //!
00052 //! @param U8 the precaler value to be written
00053 //!
00054 #ifndef __GNUC__
00055 // Ignored if IAR compiler optimization option "Always do cross call optimization" is enabled
00056 #pragma optimize=none 
00057 void Set_cpu_prescaler(U8 x)
00058 {
00059    U8 save_int=Get_interrupt_state();
00060    Disable_interrupt();
00061    CLKPR=(1<<CLKPCE);
00062    CLKPR=x;
00063    if(save_int) { Enable_interrupt(); }
00064 }
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 
00068 //! This function makes the AVR core enter power down mode.
00069 //!
00070 void set_power_down_mode(void)
00071 {
00072    Setup_power_down_mode();
00073    Sleep_instruction();
00074 }
00075 
00076 
00077 //! This function makes the AVR core enter idle mode.
00078 //!
00079 void set_idle_mode(void)
00080 {
00081    Setup_idle_mode();
00082    Sleep_instruction();
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 //! This function makes the AVR core enter adc noise reduction mode.
00087 //!
00088 void set_adc_noise_reduction_mode(void)
00089 {
00090    Setup_adc_noise_reduction_mode();
00091    Sleep_instruction();
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 //! This function makes the AVR core enter power save mode.
00096 //!
00097 void set_power_save_mode(void)
00098 {
00099    Setup_power_save_mode();
00100    Sleep_instruction();
00101 }
00102 
00103 
00104 //! This function makes the AVR core enter standby mode.
00105 //!
00106 void set_standby_mode(void)
00107 {
00108    Setup_standby_mode();
00109    Sleep_instruction();
00110 }
00111 
00112 
00113 //! This function makes the AVR core enter extended standby mode.
00114 //!
00115 void set_ext_standby_mode(void)
00116 {
00117    Setup_ext_standby_mode();
00118    Sleep_instruction();
00119 }
